contents.text: Welcome to Yammer in San Francisco, where we help you connect and collaborate across your organization to make faster decisions.
For information on products, demos, and pricing, press 1.
To schedule a live demo with our team, press 1.
Thank you, please hold while we connect you to our demo specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how Yammer can integrate with our team’s workflow.
I’d like to set up a live demo to see how Yammer can help my veterans’ support group collaborate effectively
Schedule a live demo with a Yammer specialist to explore its API integration features.
I’d like to schedule a live demo to learn how Yammer works for my organization.
I’d like to set up a live demonstration of Yammer’s collaboration features for my physics research group.

contents.text: For pricing plans and subscription options, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to our sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need a breakdown of your subscription plans and detailed enterprise pricing options.
I need details on subscription tiers and any nonprofit/veteran discounts for our organization
Request a detailed quote on Yammer’s enterprise pricing tiers and subscription models.
I need to review Yammer’s pricing plans and subscription options.
I need details on student subscription costs and plan options for academic use.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing a login error and need help from technical support right away.
I’m having trouble accessing our veteran network on Yammer and need technical assistance
Troubleshoot an API authentication error in our Yammer integration setup.
I’m having technical problems with the app and need troubleshooting help.
I’m having trouble logging in with my university’s single sign-on and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we direct you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I want to review my most recent invoice and update my billing information.
I want to discuss our billing and request an adjusted rate for our veteran-run nonprofit account
Investigate unexpected charges on my Yammer subscription invoice and update billing details.
I want to check my billing charges and update my account details.
I need to update my billing information and review recent charges on my account.
